title: The Sims 4 Reveals New Content Coming in Life and Death Expansion - OpenCritic
text: The Sims 4 released a five-minute gameplay trailer for the upcoming Life and Death expansion pack, which showcases tons of new features related to death and the afterlife. The month of October is the spookiest of them all, so it is precisely the right time for [The Sims 4](https://gamerant.com/db/video-game/the-sims-4/) to release the highly anticipated "death pack," as some community members have nicknamed it. The Sims 4 Life and Death expansion pack releases on Halloween, which will surely contribute to the macabre vibe that the devs are going for. However, until October 31, gamers will have to sit tight, as they wait for more information on Life and Death. On October 3, players got to watch the [reveal trailer for the upcoming Sims 4 pack](https://gamerant.com/the-sims-4-life-and-death-trailer-release/), but since then, not much has come out about the upcoming expansion pack. So, when The Sims Team announced that a gameplay trailer would drop on October 17, fans couldn't wait for the day to arrive. Gameplay trailers always reveal interesting features coming to the game, hidden details in the background, and additional information that might just show fans who haven't made up their mind about the pack that it's worth the money.
